Isabella Rodriguez.description: stay quiet and still, so Klauss cannot find you (staying still and quiet) @ the Ville:Isabella Rodriguez's apartment:main room:bed

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about searching for their friend Isabella in the park and deciding to split up to cover more ground and meet back in 30 minutes to update each other on their progress @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, have you seen Isabella around here?
Maria Lopez
No, I haven't seen her around.
Klaus Mueller
Let me know if you see her, I need to find her as soon as possible.
Maria Lopez
Sure, I'll keep an eye out for her. If I see her, I'll let you know.
Klaus Mueller
Thanks, I appreciate it. I'll keep looking for her around here.
Maria Lopez
Do you want me to help you look for Isabella?
Klaus Mueller
Yes, that would be great. Let's search for her together.
Maria Lopez
Let's split up and cover more ground. I'll check the east side of the park and you can check the west side.
Klaus Mueller
Okay, sounds like a plan. Let's meet back here in 30 minutes and update each other on our progress.
Maria Lopez
Okay, sounds good. I'll see you back here in 30 minutes.
Klaus Mueller
Great, I'll start searching the west side of the park right away. Let's find Isabella!
Maria Lopez
Good luck, Klaus. I'll start searching on the east side now.
Klaus Mueller
I'll keep in touch with you via text if I find her before the 30 minutes are up.
Maria Lopez
Good idea, I'll keep my phone on me in case you need to reach me.
Klaus Mueller
I'll text you if I find Isabella before the 30 minutes are up.
Maria Lopez
Okay, I'll head to the east side and start searching for Isabella now. Good luck!
